column4: is it safe, to change hoary to breezy in /etc/apt/sources.list and do and update && dist-upgrade?
generally. but i would advice to remove openoffice first. it borked my upgrade. just install it again after your done. oh, and install ubuntu-desktop before you dist-upgrade
i installed OO by myself, becaus the package in hoary was bad
yeah, same here. remove it before upgrading
